title: Netflix to get three exclusive Ubisoft games, including Assassin’s Creed
description: A new Assassin’s Creed mobile game is coming exclusively to Netflix, alongside two other mobile titles from Ubisoft.

title: The future of Ubisoft
description: Tencent recently increased its stake in the Assassin's Creed game publisher amid a period of unprecedented consolidation in the industry.

title: Move over, Iron Man: The Army has a new suit to solve soldier back pain
description: The Army is creating a next-generation ‘Iron Man’ suit for soldier back pain that is lightweight and less clunky than what it's tried in the past.

title: This robot catches grandma before she falls
description: Researchers in Singapore have created a robot that follows seniors around while they walk and can predict when they'll fall and stop it from happening.
